response.overview: Meet a very modern couple. Tamara and Diego have been married for several years. She's a beautiful and sensual woman, and he's a man every woman desires. After several suspicious behaviors from her husband, Tamara decides to have some fun with the situation by spying on him through their home's security cameras. Just as she suspected, she discovers that Diego is leading a double life behind her back. Far from being angry, she finds that her husband's affairs excite her more than she could have imagined and that she enjoys watching him have uninhibited sex with those gorgeous women.
response.title: Fantasies In Focus
